title: Evidence for Results for Medication Adherence at 12 weeks in QUARTET USA Trial Quadpill group

targetReference.display: Outcome Measure Report for QUARTET USA Trial

note.text: The published study report (https://fevir.net/resources/Citation/367878) reported 20 affected with 65.6%, but the 65.6% implies 21 affected. The results reported at ClinicalTrials.gov (https://fevir.net/resources/Composition/370504) was 21 affected with 65.6% for this outcome.

citeAs: Evidence for Results for Medication Adherence at 12 weeks in QUARTET USA Trial Quadpill group [Database Entry: FHIR Evidence Resource]. Contributors: Joanne Dehnbostel [Authors/Creators].
